mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jnu_course (course_code, course_class, course_year, course_semester, course_name, course_time, course_div, course_department, course_phone, course_campus, course_grade, course_prof, course_classroom, course_credit) VALUES (#{courseCode}, #{courseClass}, #{courseYear}, #{courseSemester}, #{courseName}, #{courseTime}, #{courseDiv}, #{courseDepartment}, #{coursePhone}, #{courseCampus}, #{courseGrade}, #{courseProf}, #{courseClassroom},#{courseCredit})
